ChainAttached_GateBlocker_LingeringTime.Description: the time gate stay blocked after the survivor is not longer attached with a chain

ChainStrike_GatewayPlacement_MinDistance.Description: The minimum distance for the Gateway to be placed from the killer's current position. (distance mesured using forward vector of the killer)

ChainStrike_GatewayPlacement_MaxDistance.Description: The maximum distance for the Gateway to be placed from the killer's current position. (distance mesured using forward vector of the killer)

ChainStrike_GatewayPlacement_Speed.Description: The speed at which the gateway is moving away from the killer when in the placement phase of the chain strike interaction.

ChainStrike_GatewayPlacement_CancelCoold.Description: The time it takes for chain strike to become available once again once the gateway placement has been cancelled.

ChainStrike_GatewayPossession_CameraPanT.Description: The time it takes for camera to pan to the gateway

ChainStrike_GatewayPossession_FoVChangeT.Description: The time it takes for the FOV change to take when possessing the gateway.

ChainStrike_GatewayPossession_CancelCool.Description: The time it takes for chain strike to become available once again once the gateway has been possessed but the chain has not been shot.

ChainStrike_GatewayPossession_MaxDuratio.Description: The maximum amount of time the killer can possess the Gateway.

ChainStrike_ShootControlledProjectile_Ca.Description: The time it takes for the camera to transition to the controlled projectile

ChainStrike_ShootControlledProjectile_Fo.Description: The time it takes for the Field of view modification to be applied when taking possession of the controlled projectile

ChainStrike_ShootControlledProjectile_Co.Description: The time it takes for chain strike to become available once again once the controlled chain has been shot

ChainStrike_UnhookImmunityDuration.Description: The amount of time the Survivor is immune to all Chain Strikes after being unhooked.

ChainStrike_SelectGatewayOrientation_Min.Description: The minimum pitch angle the gateway camera can rotate (i.e. how low can you look down)

ChainStrike_SelectGatewayOrientation_Max.Description: The maximum pitch angle the gateway camera can rotate (i.e. how high can you look up)

ChainProjectile_MaxNumbUncontrolledChain.Description: The maximum number of uncontrolled chain projectiles that can spawn at a time in the level. This is mostly a variable for optimization.

ChainProjectile_Controlled_InitialSpeed.Description: The initial speed of the controlled projectile

ChainProjectile_Controlled_MaximumYawTur.Description: The maximum yaw turn rate the server accepts per tick to modify the yaw rotation of the controlled projectile.

ChainProjectile_Controlled_MaximumPitchT.Description: The maximum pitch turn rate the server accepts per tick to modify the yaw rotation of the controlled projectile.

ChainProjectile_Controlled_MaximumTravel.Description: The maximum length the controlled projectile can travel at

ChainProjectile_Controlled_SpeedIncrease.Description: The time it takes for the controlled projectile to increase it's speed.

ChainProjectile_Controlled_RollUpdateSpe.Description: The Speed at which the roll angle rotation takes place.

ChainProjectile_Controlled_RollGoBackSpe.Description: The speed at which the roll angle rotation reverts back to its original 0Degree angle (this is used when no input has been sent for a while).

ChainProjectile_Controlled_MaximumRollDe.Description: The maximum angle in degree we rotate the roll of the controlled projectile if inputs added on the yaw.

ChainProjectile_Controlled_InstaChainNum.Description: The number of extra chains that will spawn and instantly grab the survivor hit by a controlled chain

ChainProjectile_Uncontrolled_TimeBetween.Description: The time between launching an uncontrolled chain since the last once was triggered.

ChainProjectile_Uncontrolled_MinimumSpaw.Description: The minimum spawn distance of the uncontrolled projectile from the targetted survivor.

ChainProjectile_Uncontrolled_MaximumSpaw.Description: The maximum spawn distance of the uncontrolled projectile from the targetted survivor.

ChainProjectile_Uncontrolled_MinimumWait.Description: The minimum wait time before this projectile is launched after its launch origin is revealed.

ChainProjectile_Uncontrolled_MaximumWait.Description: The maximum wait time before this projectile is launched after its launch origin is revealed.

ChainProjectile_Uncontrolled_Speed.Description: The speed of the uncontrolled projectile

ChainProjectile_Uncontrolled_MaximumTrav.Description: The maximum distance the uncontrolled projetile is allowed to travel

Chain_ReelbackSpeed.Description: The speed at which the chain projectile reels back to its origin position

Chain_RemoveChain_PerChainTime.Description: The time it takes to remove one chain during the K25RemoveChainInteraction. The more chains attached, the interaction will last this value *[NUMB_CHAINS]

Chain_MaximumNumberOfChainsAttachedAtATi.Description: The maximum number of chains that can be attached on a survivor at a time.

Chain_MaximumLength.Description: The maximum length of the chain before it breaks off

LamentConfiguration_ChainHuntChargeTime.Description: The time it takes to charge the chain hunt once the lament configuration has been spawned.

LamentConfiguration_RespawnTime_KillerPi.Description: The time it takes for the lament configuration to respawn once the killer has picked up the lament configuration.

LamentConfiguration_RespawnTime_Solved.Description: The time it takes for the lament configuration to respawn once a survivor has solved the lament configuration

LamentConfiguration_RespawnTime_Survivor.Description: The time it takes for the lament configuration to respawn once a survivor has completed the escape lament configuration grasp interaction.

LamentConfiguration_RespawnTime_FreedFro.Description: The time it takes for the lament configuration to respawn once the survivor is freed by a killer attack when held hostage by the lament configuration.

LamentConfiguration_StatusEffect_Possess.Description: The number of chains to target the possession survivor if all conditions are met for him/her to be targetted
The time between attemps to trigger chains to target the survivor holding the lament configuration

LamentConfiguration_SolveInteraction_Ski.Description: The time penalty in seconds of the solve lament configuration interaction when the player fails a skill check

LamentConfiguration_Teleport_MinDistance.Description: The minimum distance the killer will spawn towards the survivor during the lament configuration teleportation interaction

LamentConfiguration_Teleport_MaxDistance.Description: The maximum distance the killer will spawn towards the survivor during the lament configuration teleportation interaction

LamentConfiguration_KillerPickUp_NumberC.Description: The number of chains to grab each survivors when the killer picks up the lament configuration.

LamentConfiguration_KillerPickUp_ScreamB.Description: The time the survivor bubble indicator will stay on screen when a killer picks up the lament configuration and survivors scream.
